oke, here is what you should do!

Install daemontools4.
Before mouting the GT legends Image run Sfcure, just do em all.
When finished turn off your computer.
Disable the IDE cable and the power connector from ALL your cd/dvd drives.
Start your computer and mount GT legends and install the game.
When finished start the game, the game says u need to reboot, so you do that.
When back in windows again start the game, enter the serial and play the game!

piece of cake

This torrent works just fine. Here is how I got it working:

1) Get Deamon Tools 4.03 and install
2) Mount the .mds file
3) install game, but do not start it yet
4) turn off pc, remove the IDE cables from all your optical drives, ie. dvd and cd
5) now start pc and play the game

use serial FFMGU-HA34Y-V8ABF-VUN3Y-SCTRP

NB. the downside of this is that you have to dismount your optical drives every time

Guys, there IS no crack. There IS NO no-cd exe for this game. You HAVE to disable or disconnect your DVD drive. For me starforce nightmare and sfcure has always done the trick, and it runs fine. There is always going to be some trial and error on some different machines, but essentially, if all else fails, just turn your PC off, pull the molex power connector from your DVD drive, boot up, run sfcure and starforce nightmare, and it will work. 

If it doesn't, then you need to reinstall it correctly using the RMPS option with daemon tools. Also make sure you don't have a newer version of starforce installed. If you do, UNINSTALL this game, remove the new starforce driver (you can fined instructions all over google for that), and then reinstall the game using the starforce that's included with THIS game.
